name: spx-animate
description: Wrapper around GSAP that allows for staggered and scroll-based animation.

properties.name: clipPath
properties.description: Clip-path value the animation starts from.

properties.name: delay
properties.description: Delay before animation starts.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Animation duration.

properties.name: ease
properties.description: Ease being used. Accepts all common GSAP options.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: Filter value the animation starts from.

properties.name: once
properties.description: Determines if animation should only play once. (if viewport is true)

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Opacity level the animation starts from.

properties.name: repeat
properties.description: Repeats the animation. -1 to repeat indefinitely.

properties.name: repeatDelay
properties.description: Time to wait between repetitions.

properties.name: reverse
properties.description: Reverses the animation.

properties.name: stagger
properties.description: Amount of time elements should be staggered by.

properties.name: target
properties.description: The target element that should be animated inside the component.

properties.name: viewport
properties.description: Starts animation when target is in the viewport.

properties.name: viewportMarginBottom
properties.description: Adjust the root margin of the animation start.

properties.name: viewportMarginLeft
properties.description: Adjust the root margin of the animation start.

properties.name: viewportMarginRight
properties.description: Adjust the root margin of the animation start.

properties.name: viewportMarginTop
properties.description: Adjust the root margin of the animation start.

properties.name: x
properties.description: X position the animation starts from.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Y position the animation starts from.

properties.name: yoyo
properties.description:
Causes the animation to go back and forth, alternating backward and forward
on each repeat.
